full_text: FedEx Adjustment Request FAX TO (800) 548-3020 Invoice Number: 4-474-29369 Invoice Date: Nov 18, 2002 Account Number: 1814-9779-3 Page: 2 of 4 Tracking No./Airbill No. Reason Code Explanation BEFORE YOU FAX Please include detailed explanation for each adjustment request.
